alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:42PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Campbell County through 930 PM MDT... At 842 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Recluse, or 41 miles south of Broadus. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Campbell County north of Recluse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
